text: Christopher Paul Massoglia (born March 29, 1992) is an American actor and politician. He is a conservative. He was born in Minneapolis, Minnesota.Justin, Neal. "The Role of a Lifetime: Being an Ordinary Kid." Minneapolis Star Tribune. December 12, 2005. His best known movie roles are in A Plumm Summer (2007), The Hole (2009), Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant (2009), The Matchbreaker (2016) and Reagan (2022). In 2021, Massoglia was elected to the city council in Blaine, Minnesota. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American child actors Category:Actors from Minneapolis Category:Politicians from Minneapolis
title: Chris Massoglia
